channel.title: Romanesca on A J Greengrove's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Romanesca on A J Greengrove's Site

item.title: Goodbye Faraway Peaceful Town
item.description: Goodbye Faraway Peaceful Town: instead of a shepherd in Arcadia, I associate romanesca with town themes (damn gamer).

item.title: Revelations in Ancient Tombs
item.description: Revelations in Ancient Tombs: what happens when you apply “chroma”, Gesualdo-style, on a romanesca?

item.title: Autumn Moon Dance
item.description: Autumn Moon Dance: This dance-like motive unfolds in a “minor-variant romanesca”.

item.title: Chilly Nights, Quiet Winds
item.description: Chilly Nights, Quiet Winds: a meandering motive searchs out and seeks, perhaps for a warmer breeze.

item.title: Wherever The Wind Takes Me
item.description: Wherever The Wind Takes Me: arpeggiation of a single motive, resulting in a deceptively simple prelude.
